package.description: geometry_msgs provides messages for common geometric primatives such as points, vectors, and poses. These primatives are designed to provide a common data type and facilitate interoperability throughout the system.
package.author: Tully Foote

rosbuild2.msgs: msg/Point32.msg msg/QuaternionStamped.msg msg/Point.msg msg/Transform.msg msg/PointStamped.msg msg/TransformStamped.msg msg/Polygon.msg msg/Twist.msg msg/PolygonStamped.msg msg/TwistStamped.msg msg/Pose2D.msg msg/TwistWithCovariance.msg msg/PoseArray.msg msg/TwistWithCovarianceStamped.msg msg/Pose.msg msg/Vector3.msg msg/PoseStamped.msg msg/Vector3Stamped.msg msg/PoseWithCovariance.msg msg/Wrench.msg msg/PoseWithCovarianceStamped.msg msg/WrenchStamped.msg msg/Quaternion.msg
